title: Cinefantastique Vol 07 No 3 & 4 (Fall 1978)
creator: Cinefantastique
description: Double-issue featuring extensive interviews with the crew of Close Encounters of the Third Kind . Also includes articles on Battlestar Galactica , Conan the Barbarian , Dracula , Love at First Bite , Message from Space , The Shining , Starcrash and more.
